About me

The start of my journey

I have been exploring the world of movement for over twenty years, and have been dedicating myself to yoga, meditation, the wisdom of the human body and holistic medicine for over a decade. With over 900 hours of yoga trainings, I had the fortune of studying with great teachers such as Adam Harel, Simon Borg, Olivier, Noah Maze, Jason Crandell, Yoram Edan, VIjay Amar and many more wonderful and experienced teachers. I am grateful for my teachers, for always seeing me as I am, and by that directing me into my own happiness.

I taught for 6 years in Tel Aviv in major studios and mainly in Studio Naim - where I held beginner & advanced workshops as well as assisting in teacher trainings and mentoring new teachers.

A new path

‚ÄúThe body has the ability to heal itself‚Äù is the main motto in Reflexology, which I try to follow in my work and personal life. I studied two years of reflexology, and according to the Israeli standard, I am a senior reflexologist.

I moved from Tel Aviv to Berlin during 2020, the year of Covid. This transition allowed me to take a step back and reconnect to the intention behind my yoga practice and my work.

In 2021-2022 I participated in a Body Mind Centering¬Æ six month training with Nina Wehnert, in Somatic Academy, Berlin.

Osteopathy

In Sep 2021 I started Osteopathy studies in SICO - Swiss International School of Osteopathy.

Using touch, movement, meditation and breath techniques, we can address pain and dis-eases in the digestive, musculoskeletal, circulatory, respiratory, endocrine and nervous systems, decrease stress, anxiety, depression, and many more advantages.

For me, every day is an opportunity to learn something new. Nourishing the self is part of what I aim for in my personal life as well as my work. I aspire to provide each person a safe space inside themselves - so they can maintain an ongoing personal practice, and constantly grow.

Sharing love

I wish to live life fully, with joy, and to share this joy with others. I believe we are entitled to experience true acceptance - of ourselves, of everyone around us, of the present moment.

I am here to support, develop and empower you, to make your journey softer, healthier, happier.

Namaste,

Dafna
